## 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
temps <- read.csv("../data/Hanover_temps2.csv")
```

```{r}
head(temps)
```

```{r}
temps21c <- temps |>
    filter(Year >= 2000)
```

```{r}
ggplot(temps21c, aes(y=max_diff20c_avg)) +
    geom_bar()

```
